long_description: The Patagonia Downtown Loft parka offers feminine, street-smart style with the supreme warmth of lightweight, compressible, 600-fill-power premium European goose down. Shell features a Durable Water Repellent finish so light drizzle beads up and rolls off. Insulated, articulated hood stealthily stows into a shawl collar with a hidden zipper closure. Two-way front zipper makes sitting easier; wind flap keeps drafts out. Interior zippered chest pocket and zippered hand pockets stow essentials. The Patagonia Downtown Loft down parka for women offers a slim fit in a below-the-knee length.
short_description: The Patagonia Downtown Loft parka offers feminine, street-smart style with the supreme warmth of lightweight, compressible, 600-fill-power premium European goose down.
